oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A 2-year cropping system for intra-row weed control in row crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Melander, Senior scientist Bo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A biennial cropping system for weed control in vegetables is presented. The system provides a significant reduction in weed emergence in row crops.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Melander, Senior scientist Bo (1999) A 2-year cropping system for intra-row weed control in row crops. In: Proceedings of the 11th EWRS (European Weed Research Society) Symposium 1999, p. 101.
